thread.section_title: Premier Inn London Brixton Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent stay
thread.title_full: Excellent stay - Review of Premier Inn London Brixton Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: baker16
title: Excellent stay
text: The hotel was ideally located near the tube and all amenities including Brixton market which some excellent eating places, the hotel was very clean, staff helpful and friendly, we ate breakfast everyday and congratulations to the chef on his perfect poached eggs not always up to standard in other hotels. I would recommend staying here
